text: @realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar He's done a terrible job unless you are talking about dog breeding! Of course, he is just a scapegoat for your total inadequate job as president or slow and continued response to the Coronavirus pandemic! Of course, this might save his job for right now! You are the king of havoc
